content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ext_DIM_VENDTABLE] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'DIM_VENDTABLE/Archive',
        DATA_SOURCE = [eds_tx-halfen-2-dwh],
        FILE_FORMAT = [eff_Csv]   
) AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK './DIM_VENDTABLE/DIM_VENDTABLE.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR =';',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\r',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
       WITH (
       	[DW_Id] bigint,
        [ACCOUNTNUM] VARCHAR (20) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DATAAREAID] VARCHAR (4) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [NAME] VARCHAR (140) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [VENDGROUP] VARCHAR (10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DW_Batch] bigint,
        [DW_SourceCode] VARCHAR (15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
        [DW_TimeStamp] datetime2
       )
       AS [result]
